unnormalised: Hey, that's interesting! I've heard Ayurveda can be really helpful, especially for stress. My cousin, Priya, went to a retreat in Kerala, near Kochi, for Panchakarma during Onam last year. Said it completely changed her life. She used to suffer from insomnia. Now she's sleeping like a baby! Apparently, the dosha balancing really worked. I'm thinking of trying it myself. Maybe for joint pain; heard abhyanga helps. Any recommendations on good clinics?
